meanings.definition: A device that can send and receive typed messages over a distance.
meanings.sent1: The teletypewriter printed out the message from across the country.
meanings.sent2: I used the teletypewriter to send a message to my friend in another city.
meanings.sent3: The teletypewriter seemed to have a mind of its own, typing out messages without anyone touching it.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the teletypewriter keys, sending her thoughts flying across the wires.
meanings.sent5: The clacking sound of the teletypewriter was a constant reminder of distant connections.
